dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5810 EH: To amend the United States Cotton Futures Act to exclude certain cotton futures contracts from coverage under such Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To amend the United States Cotton Futures Act to exclude certain cotton futures contracts from coverage under such Act.

section.header: Excluding certain cotton futures contracts from coverage under United States Cotton Futures Act

paragraph.text: by striking except that any cotton futures contract and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: any cotton futures contract that permits tender of cotton grown outside of the United States is excluded from the coverage of this paragraph and section to the extent that the cotton grown outside of the United States is tendered for delivery under the cotton futures contract.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to cotton futures contracts entered into on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 10, 2014.
